channel.title: Adding multiple GFX'S to my Turmoil Curse [PI]

item.title: Adding multiple GFX'S to my Turmoil Curse [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So I’m trying to add the other GFX to the Turmoil Curse but it only does the animation and the first GFX not the second how could I make it do both?
Here’s my code

case 19: //Turmoil and it's animations/gfx's if (c.curseActive[i] == false) { c.startAnimation(12565); c.gfx0(2226); c.gfx0(1224); //GFX THAT WONT WORK strCurse(i); atkCurse(i); defCurse(i); mgeCurse(i); rngCurse(i); } break; }

Read full topic
item.source: Adding multiple GFX'S to my Turmoil Curse [PI]
